content:
Nerittore poraattatthil paaril veezhtthum
Veeryam cherum sleebaa vaazhum sabhaye! Bhaagyam.

Paathaallatthin vaathil tholkkum sabhaye! Bhaagyam
Veezhtthi nithyan mrthyudvaaraa thal praakaaram.

Entikkollllaan aakaashatthinnaakaatthonte
Meyu rakthangall bhaagam cheyyum sabhaye! Bhaagyam.

Gogultthaayil chintappettoraa raktham nin
Makkallkkellaam moksham nalki, sabhaye! Bhaagyam.
